simple.en: Generate a simple, single-sentence prompt. Concisely describe the content and theme of the original text;
simple.cn: 生成一个简单的单句提示词。简明扼要地描述原文中涉及到的内容和主题；

detailed.en: Create a detailed and artistic prompt. Integrate the content and themes from the original text into a coherent paragraph. Highlight key visual details;
detailed.cn: 创作一段详尽且富有艺术感的提示词。将原文中涉及到的内容和主题融合到一个连贯的段落中。重点突出关键的视觉细节；

extreme_detailed.en: Write a rich, extremely detailed, and highly descriptive paragraph that describes in detail the content and themes covered in the original text. Strive to create a highly descriptive and immersive prompt;
extreme_detailed.cn: 撰写一段内容丰富、极其详尽且描述性强的段落，详细描述原文中涉及到的内容和主题。力求创作出一段极具描述性和沉浸感的提示；
